pageContext.claim: “Very interestingly, you know, George Washington ran his business.”
pageContext.analysis: Washington, after Trump, is likely the second wealthiest man to be president, with a net worth of more than $500 million in today's dollars. But his highly sucessful whiskey business was started in 1797, after his presidency ended. There was no question about Washington having foreign entanglements in his business affairs while he was president, as there is with Trump.
